attributes.action: Accept that Palestine was ethnically cleansed by European Jews in 1948 and that it should now be returned to its original Palestinian inhabitants made up of Muslims, Christians and Jews.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Europeans, mostly Germans, were responsible for the Holocaust of the Jews when 6 million Jews were murdered during World War II. Instead of the perpetrators being punished by allocating a part of Germany to the surviving victims, the Palestinians are still paying the price for a crime they did not commit. Palestine is a land for 3 religions but is currently ruled by only one of them. This wrong must be corrected.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Accept that Palestine was ethnically cleansed by European Jews in 1948 and that it should now be returned to its original Palestinian inhabitants made up of Muslims, Christians and Jews."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14347.asp

Prime Minister's Office
